ui

Class Camera

  • java.lang.Object
    • ui.Camera

  • public class Camera
extends Object
    Camera can be used to scale and position things correctly on the stage.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Camera(int scale)
      Camera, with a center coordinate (x, y) that starts from origin and a scale.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point getPoint()
      Return cameras coordinate as a point.
      int getX() 
      int getY()

      Moves the camera by one to the direction.
      void setXY(Point p) 
      Point worldToScreen(int x, int y) 
      Point worldToScreen(Point p)
      Transformation from world coordinates to screen coordinates, with the defined scale.

      • Camera

        public Camera(int scale)
        Camera, with a center coordinate (x, y) that starts from origin and a scale.
